Attacks.Name: Aurora Beam
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to the target and reduces the target's attack strength by 1 until the end of their next activation. If a wild is rolled, apply the Frozen special condition.

Attacks.Name: Bubblebeam
Attacks.Effect: This attack causes all enemy characters within range 1 of the target to gain the Slow special condition, reducing their movement.

Attacks.Name: Hydro Pump
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals massive damage and knocks back the target L distance if a wild is rolled.

Superpowers.Name: Mist
Superpowers.Effect: Create a mist around Suicune that adds 2 dice to its defense rolls and makes it immune to all special conditions for one round.

Superpowers.Name: Purify
Superpowers.Effect: Remove all special conditions from Suicune and one other allied character within range 2. Gain 1 power for each condition removed.

Attacks.Name: Ice Fang
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target character is Frozen, skipping their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Crystallize
Attacks.Effect: This attack encases the target in ice, applying the Frozen condition. The target skips their next activation. If a wild is rolled, adjacent characters to the target also gain the Frozen condition, reducing their movement by S.

Attacks.Name: Gale Storm
Attacks.Effect: Summons a fierce windstorm, pushing all enemy characters within range 2 away M distance and dealing 1 automatic damage. If a wild is rolled, apply the Stun condition to those characters.

Superpowers.Name: Water Veil
Superpowers.Effect: Suicune and allies within range 2 gain immunity to Burn and Frozen conditions.
